table_definition.name: openstack_service
table_definition.comment: Services listed in Open Stack ingestion files.

columns.name: service
columns.comment: Service listed in Open Stack ingestion files

indexes.#: For MyISAM tables, you can specify AUTO_INCREMENT on a secondary column in a
multiple-column index. In this case, the generated value for the AUTO_INCREMENT column
is calculated as MAX(auto_increment_column) + 1 WHERE prefix=given-prefix. This is
useful when you want to put data into ordered groups.
indexes.name: increment_key
